cause.description:
We oppose the death penalty for a variety of reasons: innocent people are condemned to death; it is a cruel form of punishment; capital punishment affects minorities and poor individuals at a rate much higher than wealthy Caucasians; all forms of approved execution are methods of torture.
For more information, visit The Death Penalty Information Center at http://deathpenaltyinfo.org/
Act to Abolish the Death Penalty http://criminaljustice.change.org/petitions/view/act_to_abolish_the_death_penalty
1. The death penalty is a "cruel and unusual" punishment.
2. The death penalty does not prevent others from engaging in violent crime.
3. The death penalty is racist, classist, and unconstitutional.
cause.mission: To stop America's racist, cruel, and unjust capital punishment sentencing
cause.name: Abolish the Death Penalty
